content.raw:
That is what I see too.  So looks like there is an issue with the head frame Y position being offset in Gazebo vs ROS.
Maybe it doesn't matter, since we are getting OK results with the ROS transforms (see below, mine works now too).
Still, I suspect it has implications for moving around in the Gazebo world in phase 2.
